Docs.summary: A slice is a piece of app content and actions that can be surfaced outside of the app.

remarks.para: A slice is a piece of app content and actions that can be surfaced outside of the app.
They are constructed using Builder in a tree structure that provides the OS some information about how the content should be displayed.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A hint to indicate that the contents of this subslice represent a list of keywords related to the parent slice.

remarks.para: A hint to indicate that the contents of this subslice represent a list of keywords related to the parent slice. Expected to be on an item of format SliceItem#FORMAT_SLICE.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Hint that all sub-items/sub-slices within this content should be considered to have #HINT_LIST_ITEM.

remarks.para: Hint that all sub-items/sub-slices within this content should be considered to have #HINT_LIST_ITEM.

Docs.summary: Hint to indicate that this slice is incomplete and an update will be sent once loading is complete.

remarks.para: Hint to indicate that this slice is incomplete and an update will be sent once loading is complete. Slices which contain HINT_PARTIAL will not be cached by the OS and should not be cached by apps.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Hint that this content is a title of other content in the slice.

remarks.para: Hint that this content is a title of other content in the slice. This can also indicate that the content should be used in the shortcut representation of the slice (icon, label, action), normally this should be indicated by adding the hint on the action containing that content.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Subtype to tag an item as representing a color.

Docs.summary: Subtype to tag an item representing priority.

Docs.summary: Subtype to tag an item as representing a range.

remarks.para: Subtype to tag an item as representing a range. Expected to be on an item of format SliceItem#FORMAT_SLICE containing a #SUBTYPE_VALUE and possibly a #SUBTYPE_MAX.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Subtype to tag the source (i.

remarks.para: Subtype to tag the source (i.e. sender) of a #SUBTYPE_MESSAGE. Expected to be on an item of format SliceItem#FORMAT_TEXT, SliceItem#FORMAT_IMAGE or an SliceItem#FORMAT_SLICE containing them.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Subtype to indicate that this content has a toggle action associated with it.

remarks.para: Subtype to indicate that this content has a toggle action associated with it. To indicate that the toggle is on, use #HINT_SELECTED. When the toggle state changes, the intent associated with it will be sent along with an extra #EXTRA_TOGGLE_STATE which can be retrieved to see the new state of the toggle.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Subtype to tag an item as representing the current int value for a #SUBTYPE_RANGE.

Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
